invalidPort: Invalid parameter, port should be between 1 and 65535.
cannotDetectSeparator: Cannot automatically detect separator, please choose a separator from the dropdown.
cannotAccessFile: Cannot access file:"{0}". This might be because the application does not have access rights, or the file does not exist.
PortNameInUse: Port or name already in use

adoErrors.13: Destination table exists, but it doesn't contain some VTS columns. Try dropping and reconstructing the table.

csvErrors.10: Separator expected after a closing quote
csvErrors.11: Input stream ended but closing quotes expected

js.Disconnected hint: Click here to reconnect browser to the server
js.portInUse: The port is in use, please try a different port.
js.exportStarted: The export procedure has begun. If the export is not successful, click {0}here{1}.
js.connectionMissing: The connection string and the table name must be specified.
js.sqlMissing: A connection string and a query sql statement must be specified.
js.exportSuccessful: Export successful, {0} rows has been exported.
js.testConnFailed: Test connection failed because of an error in initializing provider
js.confirmDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to delete the entire table?
js.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the column "{0}"?
js.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the column "{0}"?
js.searchEnd: VTS has searched to the end of the table. Do you want to search from the top of the table?
js.notFound: VTS has searched the entire table. No instances of the search string were found.
js.canOnlyOnMainInst: You can only perform the action on the main instance.
js.importDbApiNote: "import_database" is disabled due to a security risk. Run "vts_import" from the server side instead.
js.exportDbApiNote: "export_database" is disabled due to a security risk. Run "vts_export" from the server side instead.
js.connectDbApiNote: "test_connection" is disabled due to a security risk. Run "node db_io.js -connect <connection_string>" from the server side instead.
js.userPermissionNeeded: To modify this data table, you must have administrator permissions.
js.notFoundLocalHelp: For local help, you need to download and install the Help Center for your product version. Copy download link to clipboard?

page.Data_Changed: data is changed on the server, click Refresh to see it
page.No_Script: Scripting is disabled, please allow scripting for the page
page.Do_You_Enable: Do you want to enable script access to the VTS data? (It will affect all running instances)
page.Enable_API_for_All: Enable/Disable API access for all running instances
page.Drop_Table_Option: The existing table will be dropped by checking this option
page.Import_From_DB_Note: To import data from the database, run "vts_import" from the server side.
page.Export_To_DB_Note: To export data to the database, run "vts_export" from the server side.
page.SQL_Statement: SQL statement for the data import
page.SQL_Query: SQL statement to do the query

page.error_not_opened: Connection to database is not opened
page.error_reserved_column_name: Column name is reserved and cannot be used as column name:%s
page.error_column_name_must_be_a_String: Column name must be a String
